languages.text: "Я был главным врачевателем на мире, принадлежащем династии Чорда. Мне довелось вылечить человека, который был обречен. Виной тому была не болезнь, но один высокомерный священник, пытавшийся исцелить его молитвой и потерпевший неудачу. Будучи посрамленным мной, он принялся сеять слухи, что мастерство мое — от {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Губительных сил{/g}. Я бежал под крыло Леди Теодоры, коя оценила мои таланты и забрала на корабль вместе с семьей".

"I was the master healer on a world that belongs to the Chorda dynasty. I had managed to cure someone who was considered doomed. Not because of their illness, but because a certain self-important priest had tried to cure them with a prayer and failed. After I put him to shame, he started spreading rumours that I owed my skill to the influence of the {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Ruinous Powers{/g}. I sought refuge under Lady Theodora, who expressed an appreciation for my talents and welcomed me and my family on her ship."
languages.original_text: "Я был главным врачевателем на мире, принадлежащем династии Чорда. Мне довелось вылечить человека, который был обречен. Не болезнью, но неудачей одного высокомерного священника, пытавшегося исцелить его молитвой и потерпевшего неудачу. Будучи посрамленным мной, он принялся сеять слухи, что мастерство мое — от {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Губительных сил{/g}. Я бежал под крыло Леди Теодоры, коя оценила мои таланты и забрала на корабль вместе с семьей".

traits.locale_text: "I was the master healer on a world that belongs to the Chorda dynasty. I had managed to cure someone who was considered doomed. Not because of their illness, but because a certain self-important priest had tried to cure them with a prayer and failed. After I put him to shame, he started spreading rumours that I owed my skill to the influence of the Ruinous Powers. I sought refuge under Lady Theodora, who expressed an appreciation for my talents and welcomed me and my family on her ship."

languages.text: "Ich war der Meisterheiler auf einer Welt der Chorda-Dynastie. Mir war es gelungen, jemanden zu heilen, der dem Tod geweiht war. Allerdings nicht wegen einer Krankheit, sondern weil ein aufgeblasener Priester erfolglos versucht hatte, ihn mit einem Gebet zu heilen. Nach dieser Demütigung verbreitete er Gerüchte, dass ich meine Fähigkeiten dem Einfluss der {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Mächte der Zerstörung{/g} verdanke. Also suchte ich Schutz bei Lady Theodora, die meine Talente schätzte und mich und meine Familie auf ihrem Schiff willkommen hieß."
languages.original_text: "I was the master healer on a world that belongs to the Chorda dynasty. I had managed to cure someone who was considered doomed. Not because of their illness, but because a certain self-important priest had tried to cure them with a prayer and failed. After I put him to shame, he started spreading rumours that I owed my skill to the influence of the {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Ruinous Powers{/g}. I sought refuge under Lady Theodora, who expressed an appreciation for my talents and welcomed me and my family on her ship."

languages.text: « J'étais autrefois le maître guérisseur d'un monde appartenant à la dynastie Chorda. J'avais réussi à guérir un malade que tous considéraient comme incurable, non pas en raison de son mal, mais parce qu'un prêtre imbu de lui-même avait échoué à le sauver par la prière. Jaloux de mon succès, ce dernier s'est mis à faire courir le bruit que je devais mes talents à l'influence des {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Puissances de la Ruine{/g}. C'est alors que j'ai cherché refuge auprès de dame Théodora, qui a reconnu mes compétences et m'a accueilli à son bord, moi et ma famille. »
languages.original_text: "I was the master healer on a world that belongs to the Chorda dynasty. I had managed to cure someone who was considered doomed. Not because of their illness, but because a certain self-important priest had tried to cure them with a prayer and failed. After I put him to shame, he started spreading rumours that I owed my skill to the influence of the {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Ruinous Powers{/g}. I sought refuge under Lady Theodora, who expressed an appreciation for my talents and welcomed me and my family on her ship."

languages.text: «Era el curandero maestro de un mundo que pertenece a la dinastía Chorda. Logré sanar a una persona que todos creían condenada; y no a causa de su dolencia, sino porque cierto sacerdote pagado de sí mismo había intentado en vano curarla con una plegaria. Cuando mi éxito lo dejó en evidencia, difundió el rumor de que mi habilidad se debía al influjo de los {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Poderes Ruinosos{/g}. Así que acudí a lady Theodora en busca de ayuda; ella supo apreciar mi talento y tuvo a bien acogernos a mi familia y a mí en su nave».
languages.original_text: "I was the master healer on a world that belongs to the Chorda dynasty. I had managed to cure someone who was considered doomed. Not because of their illness, but because a certain self-important priest had tried to cure them with a prayer and failed. After I put him to shame, he started spreading rumours that I owed my skill to the influence of the {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Ruinous Powers{/g}. I sought refuge under Lady Theodora, who expressed an appreciation for my talents and welcomed me and my family on her ship."

Logré sanar a una persona que todos creían condenada; y no a causa de su dolencia, sino porque cierto sacerdote pagado de sí mismo había intentado en vano curarla con una plegaria. languages.text: 「私はチョーダ王朝に属する世界でマスター・ヒーラーでした。絶望的だとみなされていた者を成功裏に治療できたからです。それは病気のせいではなく、とある独りよがりな司祭が祈りで治そうとして失敗したのです。私が彼に恥をかかせてしまった後、彼は私のスキルが{g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}〈禍つ神々〉{/g}の影響を受けたものだという噂を流しました。シオドーラ様のもとに身を寄せたのですが、彼の方は私の才能を高く評価し、私と家族を船へと迎え入れてくださったのです」
languages.original_text: "I was the master healer on a world that belongs to the Chorda dynasty. I had managed to cure someone who was considered doomed. Not because of their illness, but because a certain self-important priest had tried to cure them with a prayer and failed. After I put him to shame, he started spreading rumours that I owed my skill to the influence of the {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Ruinous Powers{/g}. I sought refuge under Lady Theodora, who expressed an appreciation for my talents and welcomed me and my family on her ship."

traits.locale_text: 「私はチョーダ王朝に属する世界でマスター・ヒーラーでした。絶望的だとみなされていた者を成功裏に治療できたからです。それは病気のせいではなく、とある独りよがりな司祭が祈りで治そうとして失敗したのです。私が彼に恥をかかせてしまった後、彼は私のスキルが〈禍つ神々〉の影響を受けたものだという噂を流しました。シオドーラ様のもとに身を寄せたのですが、彼の方は私の才能を高く評価し、私と家族を船へと迎え入れてくださったのです」

languages.text: “之前，我在库尔达王朝的某个世界担任主治医师。那时我成功地治愈了一个大家都认为没救了的人，那个人之所以无药可救，并不是因为病情本身有多严重，而是因为某个妄自尊大的牧师打算靠祈祷来治疗病症，但祈祷却没起作用。当我羞辱了他之后，他便四处散布谣言，说我投靠了{g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}毁灭之力{/g}，因此才拥有这么高超的医术。于是我寻求西奥多拉夫人的庇护，她对我的才能大为赞赏，欢迎我的我的家人登上她的船。”
languages.original_text: "I was the master healer on a world that belongs to the Chorda dynasty. I had managed to cure someone who was considered doomed. Not because of their illness, but because a certain self-important priest had tried to cure them with a prayer and failed. After I put him to shame, he started spreading rumours that I owed my skill to the influence of the {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Ruinous Powers{/g}. I sought refuge under Lady Theodora, who expressed an appreciation for my talents and welcomed me and my family on her ship."

languages.text: "Chorda hanedanlığına ait bir dünyada baş şifacı idim. Ölmesine kesin gözüyle bakılan birini iyileştirmeyi başardım. Ölmesine kesin gözüyle bakılmasının sebebi; hastalığı değil, kendini çok önemli sanan bir rahibin onu duayla iyileştirmeyi deneyip başarısız olmasıydı. Onu alenen utandırdıktan sonra yeteneğimi {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Yıkıcı Güçler{/g}'in nüfuzuna borçlu olduğuma dair dedikodular yaymaya başladı. Leydi Theodora'ya sığındım, o da becerilerimi takdir ederek beni ve ailemi gemisine davet etti."
languages.original_text: "I was the master healer on a world that belongs to the Chorda dynasty. I had managed to cure someone who was considered doomed. Not because of their illness, but because a certain self-important priest had tried to cure them with a prayer and failed. After I put him to shame, he started spreading rumours that I owed my skill to the influence of the {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Ruinous Powers{/g}. I sought refuge under Lady Theodora, who expressed an appreciation for my talents and welcomed me and my family on her ship."
